transcript_chunks.text: that is amazing dude you you told me something very special you're like I'm going to Super Nintendo World yeah and I was infinitely jealous of you immediately but then you're like and I'm gonna interview Miyamoto yeah whoa and I was like dude that is the coolest thing I've ever heard and I was like I gotta do the most selfish thing I've ever done yeah I wasn't selfish at all to ask you to get my copy of Super Mario All-Stars signed my very first video game I ever owned yeah and Tam came through no way no way Mario All-Stars signed by Miyamoto he even did a little Mario oh my God a Mario in the signature this is my very first video game I ever owned some would say it's the greatest video game cartridge of all time and they wouldn't be wrong includes every 2D Mario from that era fantastic stuff that's the question and now it's in blazing with me a Moto's autograph so thank you so much for that wow that is truly incredible
